author: Jacob Dressler
description:
Director Dan Trachtenberg has taken the time to reinvent the Predator film franchise several times with the prequel Prey, animated anthology Predator: Killer of Killers, and upcoming venture Predator: Badlands on the way. As fans wait to see Predator: Badlands, however, the first reactions have poured in – with some calling it a “family-friendly” endeavor. [...]

The post ‘Predator: Badlands’ Called “Family-Friendly” In First Reactions appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: ‘Predator: Badlands’ Called “Family-Friendly” In First Reactions

author: Jacob Dressler
description:
The Scream movie franchise has seen a successful revival over the last few years with the release of sequels Scream in 2022 and Scream VI in 2023. While Scream 7 got off to a rough start, however, the series is set to continue with returning franchise veteran Neve Campbell as Sidney Prescott. This has been [...]

title: First Trailer For ‘Scream 7’ Released
